Race.SpecificTitle: Chief of Police -- City of Ville Platte
Alderman at Large -- Town of Mamou
Alderman -- District E, City of Ville Platte
Police Jury Ward No. 1 -- 1.12 Mill - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
POLICE JURY WARD NO. 1 PROPOSITION
(TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 1.12 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION, THE CITY OF VILLE PLATTE EXCEPTED, FOR MAINTAINING AND UPKEEPING PUBLIC CEMETERIES LOCATED THEREIN.
Race.FullText: Shall Police Jury Ward No. 1 of the Parish of Evangeline, State of Louisiana (the "Ward"), be authorized to continue to levy a one and twelve hundredths (1.12) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the Ward, the City of Ville Platte excepted, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of maintaining and upkeeping public cemeteries located therein?

Race.SpecificTitle: Police Jury Ward No. 5 -- 1 Mill - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
POLICE JURY WARD NO. 5  PROPOSITION
(TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 1 MILL ADDITIONAL PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL, FOR MAINTAINING AND UPKEEPING PUBLIC CEMETERIES LOCATED THEREIN.
Race.FullText: Shall Police Jury Ward No. 5 of the Parish of Evangeline, State of Louisiana (the "Ward"), levy a one (1) mill tax on all the property subject to taxation within the Ward, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of maintaining and upkeeping public cemeteries located therein?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No. 4 -- 15 Mill - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
ROAD DISTRICT NO. 4 PROPOSITION
(TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 15 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR CONSTRUCTING AND IMPROVING PARISH ROADS AND HIGHWAYS WITHIN THE DISTRICT, OR FOR THE MAINTENANCE THEREOF.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 4 of the Parish of Evangeline, State of Louisiana (the "District") levy a fifteen (15) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of constructing and improving Parish roads and highways within the District, or for the maintenance thereof?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No. 5 -- 10 Mill - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
ROAD DISTRICT NO. 5 PROPOSITION
(TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 10 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR CONSTRUCTING AND IMPROVING PARISH ROADS AND HIGHWAYS WITHIN THE DISTRICT, OR FOR THE MAINTENANCE THEREOF.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 5 of the Parish of Evangeline, State of Louisiana (the "District") levy a ten (10) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of constructing and improving Parish roads and highways within the District, or for the maintenance thereof?

Race.SpecificTitle: Voting District No. 6 -- 1.12 Mill - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
VOTING DISTRICT NO. 6 PROPOSITION
(TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 1.12 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR MAINTAINING AND UPKEEPING PUBLIC CEMETERIES LOCATED IN THE DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall Voting District No. 6 of the Parish of Evangeline, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy a one and twelve hundredths (1.12) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of maintaining and upkeeping public cemeteries located therein?

Race.SpecificTitle: Wd. 5 Fire Prot. Dist. -- 11.51 Mill - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
WARD FIVE FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT PROPOSITION 
(TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 11.51 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING THE DISTRICT'S FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES, INCLUDING PAYING THE COST OF OBTAINING WATER FOR FIRE PROTECTION PURPOSES.
Race.FullText: Shall Ward Five Fire Protection District of the Parish of Evangeline, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy an eleven and fifty-one hundredths (11.51) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating the District's fire protection facilities, including paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
